description.title: AWS Solutions Architect
description.body: I am certified as Associate Solutions Architect. I am working towards professional certification.

description.title: AWS Console
description.body: I develop (Cloud9) and monitor resources. Used also for tasks like MFA Delete protection

description.title: AWS Serverless Architecture
description.body: I am very experienced in creating lambda functions, Athena, S3, Glue, SQS, SNS, and API Gateway in Console and in CDK.

description.title: AWS Cloud9 Computing
description.body: I understand how to build Cloud9 environments, and use CloudFormation for a development in the cloud (i.e., repository, git, CDK).

description.title: AWS CKD (Python)
description.body: I use CDK to fully develop a CloudFormation Template to CloudForm an architecture. I troubleshoot CDK and resolve build issues.

description.title: AWS CloudFormation (IaC)
description.body: I use CloudFormation to build an architecture in AWS. I know how to CloudForm using CodePipeline or CloudFormation directly.

description.title: AWS Grafana (AMG)
description.body: I used Amazon-Managed Grafana to build dashboards for customers. I developed a program to generate dashboards en masse.

description.title: HTML/CSS/JS
description.body: I am comfortable with these languages to design, teach, and troubleshoot bugs. I used these skills to make this website you see now.

description.title: Bootstrap
description.body: I use a lot of boostrap in the website you see now. The concepts are very clear.

description.title: React
description.body: Actively learning this language, and using it at my current job position for our main product Abacode SCOUT©.

description.title: Angular
description.body: I have seen this language, and I'm aware of its components and have read its documentation, but not yet extensive experience with it.

description.title: Python
description.body: I have over 7 years experience. I used it in my research for my Master's Degree. I'm extremely comfortable with this language.

description.title: C-Shell, Bash
description.body: I wrote award-winning U.S. Department of Defense, cross-laboratory job automation-husbandry software using shell.

description.title: MATLAB
description.body: I wrote programs for Nuclear Analysis and Design on U.S. Naval Reactor cores for the U.S. Department of Defense.

description.title: C/C++
description.body: I wrote programs in C for my Master's Degree. and I designed the best compiler in my class using C.

description.title: English
description.body: I have a refined diction that allows me to select words that accurately and succinctly convey my ideas to others.

description.title: Spanish
description.body: I have over 13 years experience in speaking Spanish. I have spoken in many scenarios and find it useful in the workplace.

description.title: AWS RDS/S3
description.body: I can standup, use, and design RDS tables in AWS. I have over 3 years experience with S3, and I understand it extremely well.

description.title: Airtable
description.body: I have stood up a database for 3 different small businesses and for 3 small projects. I use Airtable's API to integrate with other programs.

description.title: PostgreSQL
description.body: I use this in my current job position to query a PostgresDB hosted in AWS for checking constraints/design, and to write automation to CRUD records for a Web Application.

description.title: Flux/InfluxQL
description.body: Used this language when working in refrigeration system automation. Used it to query an influxDB housing refrigeration data to present data in Grafana Labs.

description.title: Git/GitHub
description.body: I have worked with git for over 5 years. I understand concepts of merging, SDLC, collaborating, and keeping track of changes.

description.title: AWS CodeCommit
description.body: I use this in my current position, and I'm very comfortable with it. I know how to setup with Cloud9 and to control developer contributions to repos.

description.title: Comparing Commits
description.body: When there is a commit issue, or there is a developer-caused conflict, I can spot the issues quickly and think through a resolve calmly and quickly.

description.title: AWS CodePipeline
description.body: I use this in my current position, I've used to carefully control changes to cloud architecture when CloudFormation is used.

description.title: Amazon (AWS)
description.body: I'm a certified Solutions Architect. I do this full time and I'm very comfortable in the AWS using code and console alike.

description.title: Google Chrome
description.body: I use Chrome as my browser full-time, and I have written a Chrome Extension. I understand the Extension building process.

description.title: HPC
description.body: I have 4 years experience issuing jobs to an HPC at the Naval Nuclear Power Laboratory for the U.S. Department of Defense.

description.title: Azure
description.body: I understand the general concepts of Azure including cybersecurity principals, and I have used Azure Devops for Agile Development.

description.title: Continuous Learning
description.body: I am trained to learn things extraordinarily quickly from my time at NNPTU. I learn new languages and techniques very rapidly.

description.title: Handling Failure
description.body: Part of learning and developing is failure. I have learned that the best way to succeed is to accept failure and response to it with persistence.

description.title: Communication/Collaboration
description.body: I participate whole-heartedly in backlog refinement, retrospectives, and daily standups to ensure there are minimal doubts.

description.title: Coded Comments
description.body: In all of my code, I write comments in a fashion so as to allow even the most novice of programmers to understand the logic and the reasoning behind each block of code.

description.title: JIRA (Atlassian)
description.body: I'm well-practiced in documenting my work in tickets, as well as blockers, time spent, and new findings/learnings.

description.title: Confluence (Atlassian)
description.body: I have used many components in this product and have written over 100 pages of research and conclusive information for two different companies.

description.title: OverLeaf (LaTex)
description.body: I used this product to create my cv, to write my master's thesis, and to write my publication. It's a tricky language, but it's a very useful one.

description.title: Lucid (Diagrams)
description.body: I use Lucid every day to make diagrams for the AWS Solutions. I understand sharing, licensing, and quick tooling. I am very quick at drawing in Lucid and can produce an entire feature drawing in under 2 days.

description.title: Wireframing
description.body: I am practiced in laying out front-end and back-end logic/flows into a diagram so that teams on both ends of a web application can collaborate smoothly. I make them simple and comprehensive with attention to detail.

description.title: DB Diagram (dbdiagram.io)
description.body: I use this application to design relational databases for my current job position. It's a very convenient tool (a little tricky to get use to), and it can save you loads of time when designing an RDS from a visual pespective.

description.title: Quality/Speed/Cost Scoping
description.body: I have an engineering, analyst, developer, and design background. I can define problems, the required level of effort, and deliver the right solution.

description.title: Computer Vision
description.body: I am published internationally in the field of computer vision. My thesis was in hand gesture detection in monochromatic thermal images.

description.title: Application Programmatic Interface (API)
description.body: I understand APIs, how to read documentation about them, how to integrate programs using them, and I have designed them myself in AWS. I understand the concept of using authorization and authentication to ensure API calls are performed with security.

description.title: Machine/Deep Learning
description.body: I learned a majority of machine learning in my Master's Degree. I used CNNs along with computer vision for hand gesture detection in thermal imaging. I have given talks/presentations and answered questions about machine learning to employees at all ranks.
